reviewText: The way the world moves today its often hard to remember that people, especially children, need time to play. We take them too and from organized play dates and lessons and everything is so structured. The point of these unusual government sponsored films is that kids need time to have unorganized simple fun and that parents should enourage them to have snowball fights and play consturctive games with eatch other. I think these films would be a very good teaching tool for young families and that there is a lesson for all of us here.
